name: FNF Chaos Nightmare for MAC
description:
ORIGINAL DESCRIPTION:

Sonic fights his inner demons during one of his nightmares, and those demons might look familiar...

This mod was done in less two days! Garbo came up with an idea, and a team of peeps from Team Quiver decided to lend a hand, with Biddle3 as a special guest! She composed "Phantasm", and was a sweetheart to work with.

FNF Chaos Nightmare for MAC
